instruction.value: Administer dose diluted in D5W 50 mL over 4 hours.
Administer dose diluted in D5W 100 mL over 4 hours.
Administer dose over 4 hours. May be extended up to 6 hours.

additionalnotes.value: Patients with serum phosphorus 0.16 to 0.32 mmol/L. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
Patients with serum phosphorus less than 0.16 mmol/L. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
For patients with serum phosphorus 0.32 mmol/L or less and weighing 40 to 60 kg (actual body weight). Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
For patients with serum phosphorus 0.32 mmol/L or less and weighing 61 to 80 kg (actual body weight). Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
For patients with serum phosphorus 0.32 mmol/L or less and weighing 81 to 120 kg (actual body weight). Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
Administer as part of Parenteral Nutrition order. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
Hypophosphatemia, administered as maintenance replacement or parenteral nutrition. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
Hypophosphatemia. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
Parenteral Nutrition, maintenance requirement. Sodium phosphate injection contains 3 mmol phosphate and 4 mmol sodium/mL.
